ComicInfo.Summary:
Don’t miss the shocking conclusion of “False Witness,” by award-winning writer Brandon Easton (STAR TREK: YEAR FIVE, MARVEL ACTION: SPIDER-MAN) and superstar artist Kei Zama (DEATH’S HEAD, TRANSFORMERS). Mathias Lincoln goes toe-to-toe with Mega-City One’s most infamous lawman in a fight not just for his life, but the lives of all the children caught in the most rotten conspiracy Mega-City One has ever seen.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Kei Zama (a) & Eva de la Cruz (c) | 1 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Jonboy Meyers | 2 |
